name: Webmon
description:
Webmon is a Pok3mon like inspired fan game.

To play right click on the game then select the "Inspect" option to display the developer console, then select the Console tab to see essential game information. 

To move simply spam the arrow keys.

Project: https://github.com/AmosNimos/Webmon

Editor: https://editor.p5js.org/DeathNotePad/sketches/utKTxnODO
